title: i am the best alistar AMA
body: I have mastered pressing heal in lane and I can q people in teamfights, AMA.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Crackdogrock,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=OtXyAoAF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-21T11:15:08.932+0000)
>
> How much cdr do you need to keep healing your creeps so the enemy can't cs

yes
What are those rocks that float around you when you ult?
sounds like red buff mate or sometimes blue buff if I accidentally steal it.
hello friends im still doing this Q@A pls submit your questions based around alistairs ill answer them all pls
When do you milk those knock ups while healing enemy wards by pressing B?

> [{quoted}](name=MageBlades,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=OtXyAoAF,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-21T20:44:43.045+0000)
>
> When do you milk those knock ups while healing enemy wards by pressing B?

I have Alistar's joke bound to ` which I can spam very easily in lane and in team fights this helps with a psychological advantage, I also tend to spam heal everywhere, the rule of thumb with alistar is if heal isn't on cooldown you need to press it regardless of location.
Can you combo heal and ult?

> [{quoted}](name=Mar3thyu,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=OtXyAoAF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-21T11:28:19.736+0000)
>
> Can you combo heal and ult?

yes
